title: An amount of Rs40,000/-or such an amount as may be decided by the Govt
clause_text: An amount of Rs40,000/-or such an amount as may be decided by the Govt. from time to time per tenement/ unit will have to be deposited by the developer with DRP as a corpus fund for utilization by the co-
